Function Documentation

◆ checkThermoDBLoad()

void checkThermoDBLoad ( ThermoDB *  db,
int  flags 
)

Performs generic tests on a ThermoDB* type to see if it can properly load species thermodynamic data.

It is assumed that the species N O NO N2 O2 are present in the database. For multiphase checks, C(gr) C CO CO2 should also be present.

Parameters
dbThe ThermoDB* object
check_multiphasetrue if multiphase should be checked
